name: Anomaly (Hedhehog)
description:
Anomaly is a puzzle game made in 48 hours for the Indie Tales Game Jam

If you want you can check out the games source code here: https://github.com/NightOwl-HS/Game-Jam-Indie-Tales

Be aware that downloading the game will make the graphics and the frames better

To play the game first extract the file and then select the Anomaly.exe file
